characterDescription: Inkima accompanies Jakamav on an afternoon when Adolin meets with him, and a group of other young lighteyes at an Outer Market wineshop. This group included Danlan, a scribe in Dalinar's army, and Torol and Eshava, both from Aladar's warcamp.

characterDetails.Appearance: Inkima is a plump woman with light yellow eyes who dyes her hair black. Red is a color that does not look good on her.
